text: There were assigned to the sons of Aaron: Hebron a city of refuge, Libnah with its pasture lands, Jattir with its pasture lands, Eshtemoa with its pasture lands,
LORD God, do not reject the plea of your anointed, remember the devotion of David, your servant.”
Judas with his army advanced to fight, and six hundred men of the king's army fell.
And the women, with cords around them, sit by the roads, burning chaff for incense;
They all ate and were satisfied.

How can you say to your brother, ‘Brother, let me remove that splinter in your eye,' when you do not even notice the wooden beam in your own eye? You hypocrite! Remove the wooden beam from your eye first; then you will see clearly to remove the splinter in your brother's eye. A Tree Known by Its Fruit.
and they said, “Is this not Jesus, the son of Joseph? Do we not know his father and mother? Then how can he say, ‘I have come down from heaven'?”
